page.title: 10A Day At Eckington School.2
page.content: At 2.35 the bell goes and we come inside and do a spelling test until 2.40, then we do the spellings we got wrong on the blackboard till about 3.00, then we have a story until 3.30 when we go home. {Crispin's Day At School } I usually leave home at 8.30 and either walk or ride in the car to school. When I reach school I prepare for lessons and play with my friends until 9.00. after assembly we do Maths board work until the first playtime which lasts 15 minutes. After play we do geography from text books for an hour until lunch at 12.00. After lunch in the hall , or outside if it's fine , we play until 1.30, then we do history . At the moment we are studying Saxons . We have a play break then we go into the hall and rehearse our plays until hometime at 3.30.
